item.description:
The agenda from last night's meeting seemed to work pretty well, so let's follow that lead next month.

6:30 - Meet and greet (incl. food & drink for the hungry/thirsty)

7:00 - Opening remarks and call for Open Forum discussion topics

7:15 - Topic A: Custom Post Types & Custom Fields -- Presented by Amanda Giles, co-organizer of this Meetup

8:00 - Open Forum

8:25 - Closing Remarks

8:30 - Post-Meetup Networking/Refreshments

 

This month's presentation will be on Custom Post Types & Custom Fields. Amanda will be demonstrating how to use these 2 important aspects to customize your website's content. Some examples will involve modifying your WordPress theme template's PHP code, but others will just show using CSS to style content types differently from other aspects of your website.

group.name: Manchester, NH WordPress Developers and Users

item.name: April 2013 Meetup - Topic A: Custom post types & Custom Fields
